TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentIdProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base abstract class for implementing a Document ID generator.

remarks.para: It is highly recommended that the Document ID generator provide IDs that are both unique and readily type-able by a user.

MemberSignature.Value: protected DocumentIdProvider ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: DocumentIdProvider();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool DoCustomSearchBeforeDefaultSearch { get; }
.property instance bool DoCustomSearchBeforeDefaultSearch
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DoCustomSearchBeforeDefaultSearch As Boolean
public: abstract property bool DoCustomSearchBeforeDefaultSearch { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a Boolean value specifying whether the current instance of the provider custom search method () should be called before built-in search is called when the user is trying to locate a document by its value.
Docs.value: true if the provider custom search method (GetDocumentUrlsById) should be called before built-in search; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Set this property to true when using is more efficient than using the default search is when locating a document by its Document ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string GenerateDocumentId (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListItem listItem);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GenerateDocumentId(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListItem listItem) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GenerateDocumentId (listItem As SPListItem) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ GenerateDocumentId(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPListItem ^ listItem);

Docs.param: An object that specifies the item for which a document ID must be generated.
Docs.summary: Generates a document ID when provided with a list item parameter that corresponds to a document.
Docs.returns: A string that represents the newly generated Document ID.

remarks.para: It is highly recomended that the Document ID generator provides IDs that are both unique and readily type-able by user.

Docs.param: object that specifies the site in which to search for documents with the provided object.
A object that specifies the site in which to search for documents with the provided object.
Docs.summary: Implements a custom search method; returns an array of URLs pointing to documents with a specified value.
Docs.returns: A string arrays of URLs pointing to documents with the specified Document ID.

Docs.param: An object that specifies the site in which the web part is located.
Docs.summary: Returns the default Document ID value that will be initially displayed in the Document ID search web part.
Docs.returns: A string representing the default Document ID value that will be initially displayed in the Document ID search web part.
